name: Platformer (Lecks)
description:
A platformer game where the game must run, jump and wall-run to collect a key and reach the end of the game. Features wall-running, foot IK, and footsteps based on physical materials.

Instructions:

  • WASD to run around.
  • Move the mouse to rotate the camera.
  • Space bar to jump.
  • E to interact.

Uses content from Epic's Hour of Code tutorial series.
